title: Japan marks 2 years since devastating Noto quake as locals rebuild lives
description: Japan on Thursday marked two years since a powerful earthquake rocked the Noto Peninsula in central Japan, killing over 200 people and severely damaging tens of thousands of houses, with locals hopeful that recovery will continue to progress. A memorial servi…
content: Japan on Thursday marked two years since a powerful earthquake rocked the Noto Peninsula in central Japan, killing over 200 people and severely damaging tens of thousands of houses, with locals hopef… [+3234 chars]
de: Japan feiert den zweiten Jahrestag des verheerenden Erdbebens in Noto, während die Einheimischen ihr Leben wieder aufbauen. Japan jährte sich am Donnerstag zum zweiten Mal, seit ein schweres Erdbeben die Noto-Halbinsel in Zentraljapan erschütterte, bei dem über 200 Menschen ums Leben kamen und Zehntausende Häuser schwer beschädigt wurden. Die Einheimischen hoffen, dass die Erholung weiter voranschreitet. Ein Gedenkgottesdienst…
en: Japan marks 2 years since devastating Noto quake as locals rebuild lives. Japan on Thursday marked two years since a powerful earthquake rocked the Noto Peninsula in central Japan, killing over 200 people and severely damaging tens of thousands of houses, with locals hopeful that recovery will continue to progress. A memorial servi…
la: Iaponia marcas 2 annorum cum Noto vastando commovetur ut incolas incolis aedificet. Iaponia die Iovis biennio notata est, ex quo vehemens terrae motus Noto Peninsulam in media Iaponia gestavit, super 200 homines occidens et decem milia domorum graviter laedens, cum incolis sperans recuperationem illam progressuram perget. Monumentum servi…

title: Something hidden deep underground supercharged this Chile earthquake
description: A powerful 7.4-magnitude earthquake struck northern Chile in July 2024—and it wasn’t supposed to be that strong. Unlike Chile’s infamous shallow “megathrust” quakes, this one ruptured deep inside the Earth, where shaking is usually weaker at the surface. Rese…
content: In July 2024, a magnitude 7.4 earthquake hit near the city of Calama in northern Chile. The shaking damaged buildings and disrupted electrical power across the region.Chile is no stranger to major ea… [+4796 chars]
de: Etwas tief unter der Erde hat dieses Erdbeben in Chile beschleunigt. Ein starkes Erdbeben der Stärke 7,4 erschütterte im Juli 2024 den Norden Chiles – und es hätte nicht so stark sein sollen. Im Gegensatz zu Chiles berüchtigten flachen „Megathrust“-Beben brach dieses tief im Erdinneren aus, wo die Erschütterungen an der Oberfläche normalerweise schwächer sind. Rese…

Unlike Chile’s infamous shallow “megathrust” quakes, this one ruptured deep inside the Earth, where shaking is usually weaker at the surface. Rese…
la: Aliquid absconditum profunde sub terra super hoc Chile terrae motus oneravit. Terrae motus potens 7.4-magnitudo Chile septentrionali mense Iulio 2024 percussit — et fortis ille non putabatur. Secus Chile vadum infame "megathrustum" commovet, hic profunde in Terra rupta, ubi concussio plerumque in superficie debilior est. Rese…
